dbDirectoryPath: <Complete path of the folder where rtl's database file should be saved>

authentication.macaroonPath: <Complete path of the folder containing LND admin.macaroon for the node>
authentication.runePath: <Complete path including filename for CLN rune for the node, rune format 'LIGHTNING_RUNE=
authentication.lnApiPassword: <Can be used to provide password in ECL implementation>
authentication.swapMacaroonPath: <Complete path of the folder containing Loop's loop.macaroon for the node>
authentication.boltzMacaroonPath: <Complete path of the folder containing Boltz admin.macaroon for the node>
authentication.configPath: <Optional:Path of the .conf if present locally or empty>

settings.bitcoindConfigPath: <Optional: path of bitcoind.conf path if available locally>
settings.lnServerUrl: <url for LND REST APIs for node #1 e.g. https://192.168.0.1:8080>
settings.swapServerUrl: <url for swap server REST APIs for the node. e.g. https://127.0.0.1:8081>
settings.boltzServerUrl: <url for boltz server REST APIs for the node. e.g. https://127.0.0.1:9003>
settings.blockExplorerUrl: <url for local or centralized block explorer. e.g. https://mempool.space>
